parameters.name: ObjectType
parameters.description: The type of the object. Set the value to **Domain**, which indicates a domain name.

parameters.name: Objects
parameters.description: The protection asset that you want to remove from a policy. Separate multiple protection assets with commas (,).

parameters.name: PolicyId
parameters.description:
The ID of the policy.

> You can call the [DescribeSceneDefensePolicies](~~159382~~) operation to query the IDs of all policies.
